hadiths.text: This hadith has been narrated on the authority of A'mash up to the words:" Allah's Apostle (ﷺ) pronounced judgment and he was stoned (to death)" And he mentioned nothing subsequent to that pertaining to the revelation of verses

chapter.ara-name: باب رَجْمِ الْيَهُودِ أَهْلِ الذِّمَّةِ فِي الزِّنَا
chapter.eng-name: Stoning Jews and Ahl Adh-Dhimmah for Zina
